reviewText: A visual and heartfilled feast. Dynamic Kaori Momoi is charismatic as the center-of-energy mom to the chaotic loving arguing Kadowaki family, while a fig tree shines in the garden. Momoi wrote, directed and starred. Art director is sensei Takeo Kimura (represented in 4 films on Criterion).  2006 (color), 94 min., Japanese with English subtitles. Directed by Kaori Momoi. With Kaori Momoi, Hanako Yamada, Saburo Ishikura.
